extraction_notes: Lines 200-500 contain identical site-wide news content as all other pages. This is a structural/navigation page for the gallery section. Bilingual slug (galerii-gallery) suggests this page serves both Estonian and English audiences. Differentiation through hero background and gallery-specific images. Listed in main navigation as 'galerii / gallery'.
